          <title>
            <string language="en">Analogue and digital signals</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Analoge und digitale Signale</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Signaux numériques analogiques et</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Sinais análogos e digitais</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Segnali numerici analogue e</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αναλογικά και ψηφιακά σήματα</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Señales analogicas y digital</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">This illustration compares the graphs of analogue signals (left) and digital signals (right) with decreasing amplitudes.</string>
          </description>
          <language>x-none</language>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">amplitudes</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">analogue signals</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">digital signals</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Pattern</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">quality</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">sound</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>atomic</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Diese Abbildung vergleicht die Diagramme der 
Analogsignale (nach links) und der digitalen Signale (recht) mit 
abnehmenden Umfängen.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Cette illustration compare les graphiques des 
signaux analogues (à gauche) et des signaux numériques (droits) aux 
amplitudes décroissantes.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Esta ilustração compara os gráficos de sinais 
análogos (à esquerda) e dos sinais digitais (direitos) com as 
amplitudes diminuindo.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Questa illustrazione paragona i grafici dei 
segnali di analogico (a sinistra) e dei segnali numerici (di destra) 
alle ampiezze di diminuzione.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτή η απεικόνιση συγκρίνει τις γραφικές παραστάσεις 
των αναλογικών σημάτων (αριστερά) και των ψηφιακών σημάτων 
(δεξιά) με τα μειωμένος εύρη.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Esta ilustración compara los gráficos de 
señales analogicas (a la izquierda) y de señales digital (derechas) 
con amplitudes que disminuyen.</string>
          </description>
